note.title: Discussion Venues
note.t: Discussion of this document takes place on the DRIP Working Group mailing list (drip@ietf.org), which is archived at https://mailarchive.ietf.org/arch/browse/drip/.
Source for this draft and an issue tracker can be found at https://github.com/IETF-DRIP/draft-moskowitz-drip-crowd-sourced-rid.
